/start.response:
👋 Welcome to Claude Code Telegram Bot, Max!

🤖 I help you access Claude Code remotely through Telegram.

**Available Commands:**
• `/help` - Show detailed help
• `/new` - Start a new Claude session
• `/ls` - List files in current directory
• `/cd <dir>` - Change directory
• `/status` - Show session status
• `/actions` - Show quick actions
• `/git` - Git repository commands

**Quick Start:**
1. Use `/projects` to see available projects
2. Use `/cd <project>` to navigate to a project
3. Send any message to start coding with Claude!

🔒 Your access is secured and all actions are logged.
📊 Use `/status` to check your usage limits.

/cd.response:
**Usage:** `/cd <directory>`

**Examples:**
• `/cd mydir` - Enter subdirectory
• `/cd ..` - Go up one level
• `/cd /` - Go to root of approved directory

**Tips:**
• Use `/ls` to see available directories
• Use `/ls` to see all subdirectories
